>
[Called (Accessory Rune)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1386)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to any item of light or negligible Bulk

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

With this rune, you can instantly retrieve an item in your possession without digging around looking for it.
